multiplechoiceresponse.p: Which of the following delivery semantics does Redis Pub/Sub support?
multiplechoiceresponse.label: Choose one answer

choicegroup.choice: Either at-most-once or at-least-once, depending on how it's used

div.p: Pub/Sub can only implement the At Most Once delivery pattern because messages are not persisted. This means that if no client is subscribed to a channel when a message is published on it, that message will never be received by any client.
